body.p: Functions are blocks of reusable code that perform a specific task. Functions allow you to break down your code into smaller, reusable units. They improve code readability, maintainability, and reusability.

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: # Example of defining and calling functions def greet(name): print("Hello, " + name + "!") greet("Alice") # Output: Hello, Alice!
